lead_paragraph: GACCIONE--Marion Bunnell, 98, Manhattan, died Monday. Nieces: Mary Katherine (Michael), Jane (James), grand- nephews, Jonathan, William, Damon, Matthew. Predeceased: husband, Anthony. Graveside: 11:15, Saturday, Montrose Cemetery. Viewing: one hour prior at BartronMyer Funeral Home, Inc., Montrose, PA. Contributions: St. Thomas Choir School. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GACCIONE, MARION BUNNELL
